Sebar Video Mesum dengan Pacar, Wanita di Pangkalpinang Ditangkap
01 Nov 2019, 22:06 by Deni Wahyono
Bangka - Anggota Unit Reskrim Polsek Jebus bersama anggota Reskrimum Polda Bangka Belitung (Babel) menangkap wanita berinisial AC (30). AC diringkus karena menyebarkan video mesum bersama pacarnya di media sosial.
"Pelaku diamankan berdasarkan laporan korban, HE (24) yang tak lain merupakan pacar AC, karena merasa dirugikan atas penyebaran konten video asusila," jelas Kapolsek Jebus AKP M Saleh saat dihubungi detikcom, Jumat (1/11/2019) malam.
Menurut Saleh, video yang disebarkan di media sosial Facebook itu dibuat pada tanggal 5 Oktober 2019 lalu sekitar pukul 18.30 WIB. Polisi yang mendapat laporan langsung melakukan penyelidikan. Unit Reskrim Polsek Jebus bersama Reskrimum Polda Bangka Belitung (Babel) berhasil mengungkap penyebar video asusila.
Pelakunya tak lain adalah pacar pelapor (korban) yang merekam secara diam-diam menggunakan handphone milik pelaku saat berhubungan badan.
"Pelaku dan korban ini berpacaran. Hasil pemeriksaan, pelaku mengaku menyebar video ke Facebook tujuannya untuk mempertahankan hubungan mereka," kata Saleh.
Pelaku diamankan di sebuah Cafe D, One Pantai Pasir Padi, Pangkalan Baru, Kota Pangkalpinang, Pulau Bangka. Korban mengetahui video hubungan suami istri dirinya bersama pelaku tersebar di media sosial dari temannya. Atas kejadian tersebut korban langsung melaporkan ke Polsek Jebus guna penyidikan lebih lanjut.
"Akibat perbuatannya, pelaku dikenakan pasal 45 ayat (1) UU RI No. 11 Tahun 2008, tentang informasi dan transaksi elektronik. Dan terancam pidana 6 tahun dan atau denda paling banyak 1 milyar rupiah," tegasnya.
Sementara itu, polisi juga berhasil mengamankan barang bukti satu unit handphone merk OPPO F7 warna hitam yang digunakan untuk merekam adegan suami istri. Kini pelaku mendekam di sel jeruji besi Polsek Jebus, Bangka Barat untuk mempertanggungjawabkan perbuatannya.

Spread Video Pervert with Boyfriend, Woman in Pangkalpinang Arrested
Nov 01 2019, 22:06 by Deni Wahyono
Bangka - Members of the Jebus District Police Criminal Unit together with members of the Bangka Belitung Regional Police Criminal Unit (Babel) arrested the woman with the initial AC (30). AC was arrested for spreading obscene videos with his girlfriend on social media.
"The perpetrators were secured based on the victim's report, HE (24) who was none other than AC boyfriend, because he felt aggrieved over the distribution of immoral video content," explained Police Chief Jebus AKP M Saleh when contacted by AFP on Friday (11/01/2019) night.
According to Saleh, the video distributed on Facebook's social media was made on October 5, 2019 and then around 18:30 WIB. The police who get the report immediately conduct an investigation. Jebus Police Criminal Investigation Unit together with the Bangka Belitung Regional Police Criminal Investigation Unit (Babel) succeeded in uncovering the obscene video disseminator.
The culprit is none other than the rapporteur's girlfriend (victim) who secretly records using the perpetrator's cellphone during intercourse.
"The perpetrators and victims are dating. The results of the examination, the perpetrators claimed to spread the video to Facebook in order to maintain their relationship," Saleh said.
The perpetrators were secured at a Cafe D, One Pantai Pasir Padi, Pangkalan Baru, Kota Pangkalpinang, Bangka Island. The victim learned the video of her husband's relationship with the perpetrator spread on social media from his friend. For this incident the victim immediately reported to the Jebus Police Station for further investigation.
"As a result of his actions, the perpetrators were subject to article 45 paragraph (1) of RI Law No. 11 of 2008, concerning information and electronic transactions. And they were threatened with a criminal sentence of 6 years and or a maximum fine of 1 billion rupiah," he said.
Meanwhile, the police also managed to secure evidence of a black mobile OPPO F7 brand used to record scenes of husband and wife. Now the perpetrator is languishing in the iron bars of Jebus Police Station, West Bangka to take responsibility for his actions.
